short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Figure out who the account you follow recently followed when using the SnoopInsta web service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
----- Prominent Disclosure -----
This extension uses your IG session cookies for the sole purpose of showing the list of accounts followed by individuals you are following on IG.

SnoopInsta is an extension to be used together with the web service at SnoopInsta.com.

With the help of the extension and the web service at SnoopInsta, you can easily figure out who the account you follow recently followed. You can do this manually by scrolling through their following list on Instagram. But this extension makes it easier and more convenient for you to obtain that information.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Why do you need this extension? ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

This extension securely sends relevant information to the web service at SnoopInsta.com so the information can be presented in a clear and concise manner, and is presented alongside other relevant information that the extension does not provide. Without the extension, you can only view some basic information on SnoopInsta.com but not the information on recent follows.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Security ▬▬▬▬▬▬

● The extension neither asks for your IG password, nor any of your data including your IG private information, story, visit history, posts, and social relationships.
● We do not store or have any intention to store any sensitive information on our servers. 
● The processes that are required for this extension to function as intended are run within your browser and stays within your browser.
● Users have the option to revoke all permissions at any time.
